QuestData.Title: Monitoring the Rift: Sundered Chasm
QuestData.Description: Did you feel that?! That was just an aftershock... you should've been here a few minutes ago!$b$bI'm afraid I must call upon your services again. My instruments indicate that there is an immense disruption just west of here, far beneath the water's surface.$b$bJust as before, I need you to take the arcanometer and capture the anomaly's data.$b$bI'll cast a spell that will enable you to breathe underwater. If it wears off before you find it, come let me know and I'll renew its effects.
QuestData.LogDescription: Garren at Amber Ledge wants you to use the Arcanometer at the Sundered Chasm anomaly and return to him with the readings.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, $c?$b$bWere you able to locate the anomaly?
QuestData.RewardText: It was how big?$b$bThat's impossible! I need to report to Dalaran at once!
